vtkwindow module¶

class vtkwindow.GlyphViewer(parent, points)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QFrame

Full Vtk frame class

button_load()¶

Loading points file and start preview of it

filename_status¶
reredner_points(list_of_points)¶

Updates label with which files has been loaded

Parameters

list_of_points (ndarray) – List of points xyz, xn3

run_filter(radius, angle, db_type, is_ground_pnts, is_objects_pnts)¶

Starting the process of filtering of loaded file with set parameters

Parameters

  • radius (str) – Searched radius in meters

  • angle (str) – Treshold angle in degrees

  • db_type (int) – Type of database (Point Cloud = 0, Equal Cells = 1, K-d tree = 2)

  • is_ground_pnts (bool) – Parameter to show or not ground points

  • is_objects_pnts (bool) – Parameter to show or not objects points
